holidays.title: International Allyship Day
holidays.description: Let's celebrate strength in unity and embrace diversity and differences to create a sense of belonging for all.

holidays.title: International Cat Day
holidays.description: A day to celebrate one of man’s most common and ancient pets.

holidays.title: National Braiders Day
holidays.description: Learn more about the cultural significance of braiding and the talented professionals behind the social art.

holidays.title: Culturama Day
holidays.description: Marvel at the beauty of the Caribbean in the cultural displays of Culturama Day.

holidays.title: Digital Nomad Day
holidays.description: In an increasingly online world, any corner of any city could be your office.

holidays.title: Dying to Know Day
holidays.description: Today is about fostering deep conversations about the one thing all humans have in common — death.

holidays.title: Happiness Happens Day
holidays.description: Happiness happens and see how you can make it happen today, on Happiness Happens Day.

holidays.title: National Anne Day
holidays.description: Let us examine the compelling but often tragic history of well-known Annes.

holidays.title: National CBD Day
holidays.description: Set aside a day of relaxation and enjoy our great facts about C.B.D.’s benefits.

holidays.title: National Dollar Day
holidays.description: Join us in observing a significant moment in the history of the United States.

holidays.title: National Frozen Custard Day
holidays.description: Get ready to treat your sweet tooth with this tasty frozen dessert.

holidays.title: National Liam Day
holidays.description: Learn all about the name ‘Liam’ and why it's so special this National Liam Day.

holidays.title: National Melvin Day
holidays.description: Did you know that conflict brought the Melvin name to us? Read on to learn more.

holidays.title: National Mochi Day
holidays.description: It’s National Mochi Day, so indulge your taste buds with these sticky orbs of goodness.

holidays.title: National Perler Day
holidays.description: Get your Perler beads ready and let’s start creating amazing pixel art to celebrate this day!

holidays.title: National Pickleball Day
holidays.description: Put on your sports shoes and shorts, for it is time to play pickleball.

holidays.title: National Sneak Some Zucchini Onto Your Neighbor's Porch Day
holidays.description: Sneak up your neighbor’s garden path and leave a little surprise on this cheeky day.

holidays.title: National Tarantula Appreciation Day
holidays.description: Find out what tarantulas stand for as we highlight them on National Tarantula Appreciation Day.

holidays.title: Odie Day
holidays.description: Bring out your old “Garfield” comics because today, we celebrate Odie Day.

holidays.title: Peace Festival in Augsburg
holidays.description: The Peace Festival in Augsburg has been Germany’s only municipal public holiday since 1950.

holidays.title: Peasants' Day
holidays.description: We celebrate all the hardworking farmers who ensure we have a healthy meal.

holidays.title: Scottish Wildcat Day
holidays.description: Be ready to raise awareness about the importance of taking care of endangered species.

holidays.title: Take a Penny/Leave a Penny Day
holidays.description: It's a day about change, and we're here to show you fun ways to celebrate it.

holidays.title: Top 8 Challenge Day
holidays.description: Step up your fundraising game for Top 8 Challenge Day with all our information.

holidays.title: Wear Your Mother’s Jewelry Day
holidays.description: Proudly wear your mother’s heirloom to honor their legacy this Wear Your Mother’s Jewelry Day.

holidays.title: Dustin Hoffman’s Birthday
holidays.description: Dustin Hoffman altered how actors were regarded and what they were allowed to achieve.

holidays.title: JC Chasez’s Birthday
holidays.description: Happy birthday J.C., we hope you never say “bye-bye-bye” to music.

holidays.title: Jentzen Ramirez’s Birthday
holidays.description: For this actor, YouTuber, and martial arts student, the sky's the limit.

holidays.title: Meagan Good’s Birthday
holidays.description: Meagan Good is a talented actress who is a good role model to children and an inspiration to many.

holidays.title: Roger Federer’s Birthday
holidays.description: Here, we tell the story of the greatest male tennis player of all time.

holidays.title: Ryan Garcia’s Birthday
holidays.description: Meet the youngest boxer to win a world title in three different weight classes.

holidays.title: Shawn Mendes’s Birthday
holidays.description: For this exceptionally talented, award-winning singer, life is all about sharing the joy of music.
